jp: アンドレア・ドーリア

skills.name: High-Explosive Battery (燃烧炮击)
skills.text: 1. On [Main Battery Salvo] hit, 100% chance to apply 1 stack of [Fire] and 50% chance to apply another stack of [Fire]. Each stack of [Fire] deals 110% of Firepower over 10 seconds.

skills.name: Incoming Torpedo Alert (鱼雷预警)
skills.text:
Reduces all incoming damage by 10%.
When entering a battle, obtains a shield with 20% of Max HP that absorbs [Torpedo Salvo] damage.
